Name: Choice of Zombies
About the game: Fight for survival in a world overrun by zombies! Can you stay alive long enough to get your friends to a place of safety? Will you keep your humanity intact or become a bloodthirsty zombie hunter? And will you discover the secret behind the zombie virus? 'Choice of Zombies' is a 140,000 word interactive fantasy novel by Heather Albano and Richard Jackson, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.
